ingredients.item: 50ml Highland Park 12 Year Old Single Malt Whisky
1 tsp Monin pure cane sugar syrup
Cherry wrapped in orange peel, to garnish

instructions.step: Gently muddle together the orange peel, Angostura Bitters and sugar syrup. Pour into a rocks glass. Add cubed ice and the whisky. Garnish with a cherry wrapped in orange peel.
